Title: There But for the Grace of God, Go I
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Alyssa Clark, David Grimm (story editor), Alyssa Clark (story editor), Yasemin Yilmaz (staff writer)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Zuleikha Robinson, Kurt Egyiawan
Plot: While a foster home experiences multiple strange incidents, the demon responsible makes its presence known to Tomas and Marcus.
